title: Return of the Quadzilla (Realistic Edition)
notes: Full-body comeback with clear Apple Watch modes at the right time. KB max 45 lbs, DBs max 50 lbs.

items:
Set
 Apple Watch mode to 'Indoor Walk' for this section
Short incline walk or jog at brisk pace

blocks.name: Strength Reboot (Lower Pull + Push)
blocks.instructions: Focus on controlled tempo and clean reps.
blocks.apple_watch: Switch to 'Functional Strength Training' mode for this block

blocks.name: Upper Pull + Core Stability
blocks.apple_watch: Keep on 'Functional Strength Training' mode for this block

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.notes: Add bank or weight as needed

blocks.name: The Sweat Protocol
blocks.instructions: EMOM 18 (Every Minute on the Minute): Rotate 3 stations, six total rounds.
blocks.apple_watch: Switch to 'HIIT' mode for this block

blocks.name: Optional Finisher
blocks.apple_watch: Switch back to 'Functional Strength Training' mode for this block
